questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In 10 years time, I would like to be a famous journalist and travel around the world. I really enjoy travelling because I love moving and discover new things. But I also like to be informed and know what is happening in the world. In fact, I think that it is important to know the issues of our world and to try to find solutions about it.
